thread.section_title: KISA phone Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KISA phone | kisaphone.com.au
thread.title: Tracy Stanton
thread.title_full: KISA phone reviewed by Tracy Stanton

author: Tracy Stanton
title: Tracy Stanton
text: This phone is NOT good for dementia patients. It could be made better if the button for who is calling lit up, and had a missed calls function. Also the billing of it goes up and down each month, I was Quote: d $60 per month, but my bills are usually $75 per month. Overall not happy
